wikipedia_page.main: Seth Lewis Plum (15 July 1899 – 29 November 1969) was an English international footballer who played as a wing half.

response: *In total, 12 Charlton players have received full England caps. The first was Seth Plum, in 1923 and the most recent was Darren Bent, in 2006. Luke Young, with 7 caps, is Charlton's most capped England international.
